scripts.build:ksw: npm run clean && ./scripts/generate-NetworkParams_sol.js --network ksw-ksw && npx truffle compile
scripts.build:testnet: npm run clean && ./scripts/generate-NetworkParams_sol.js --network kovan-sokol && npx truffle compile
scripts.build:mainnet: npm run clean && ./scripts/generate-NetworkParams_sol.js --network mainnet-dai && npx truffle compile
